definition: to drill/to bore/to get into/to make one's way into/to enter (a hole)/to thread one's way through/to study intensively/to dig into/to curry favor for personal gain

sentences.english: When a student recently saw two workmen using a pneumatic drill outside his university.
sentences.chinese: 最近有個學生看見兩個工人在大學校門外用風鑽幹活。

sentences.english: As the men refused to stop working, the police attempted to seize the pneumatic drill.
sentences.chinese: 由於工人拒絕停下手中的活，警察想奪風鑽。

sentences.english: The importance and application of a new type pneumatic drill in drilling are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了風鑽在鑿巖和鑽探技術中的重要性和應用。

sentences.english: The noise from that pneumatic drill outside gets on my nerves.
sentences.chinese: 外面風鑽的噪音真使我心煩。
